featured.text: The farmhouse and fruit trees were all gone and nothing was left.

definition.zh_def: 農舍：位於農場上的住宅，通常用於農業工作和居住。
definition.en_def: A farmhouse is a dwelling located on a farm, typically used for agricultural work and living.
definition.example: They spent their summer vacation in a charming farmhouse surrounded by fields.
